headline: Space Cybersecurity Company Evaluation Report 2025 | Thales, Leonardo, and Lockheed Martin Strengthen Leadership with Advanced Encryption, Mission-Critical Solutions, and Strategic Partnerships
summary: The Space Cybersecurity Companies Quadrant offers a crucial analysis of the global Space Cybersecurity market, spotlighting advancements, trends, and key players. This study identifies the Top 24 Space Cybersecurity leaders among over 100 evaluated firms, highlighting their contributions to military, governmental, and commercial sectors. headline: Why AI data centers — and 3 other areas — could be next as Trump aims to replicate his stake in Intel
summary: Donald Trump is making plans to have the government take a 10% stake in Intel. Recent days have seen officials offering hints as to what might be next.
